title: 3 and Out - NFL Can't 'Trust the Process'; Cole Beasley's Anti-Vaxx Battle; Pro-Tax Payer Stadium Funding; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - NFL Can't 'Trust the Process'; Cole Beasley's Anti-Vaxx Battle; Pro-Tax Payer Stadium Funding; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why no NFL team would ever 'Trust the Process' and rebuild by tanking like NBA teams, his take on Cole Beasley's anti-vaxx battle with the NFL, why the Bears should ask to get tax payer funding for a new stadium, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
